channel.title: Apple Trade-In on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Apple Trade-In on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Apple Updates Trade-In Values Following iPhone 17 Event
item.description: Following the debut of the new iPhone 17 models, the iPhone Air, updated Apple Watch models, and the AirPods Pro 3, Apple updated trade-in values for older devices and assigned a value to the iPhone 1
